the ipad pro tablet is seeing limited availability at stores in major cities in the u.s. , australia and europe
apple has been planning to debut a new ipad pro with upgraded cameras as early as the first half of this year. the presence of the virus may still disrupt apple 's plans
a review of facebook 's online store showed the oculus quest virtual reality headset with 128 gigabytes of storage is-unavailable. hp+s website showed some envy, pavilion and slim desktop computers are out of stock
the cupertino- california-based company did't respond to a request for comment on monday. facebook said its oculus quest headset has been selling out in some regions due to high demand
